name: Richard Harold Kirk
description: '''Richard Harold Kirk''' (21 March 1956 â€“ 21 September 2021) was an English composer, musician and producer. He is best known for his work in [[electronic music]], and for co-founding the influential music group [[Cabaret Voltaire (band)|Cabaret Voltaire]] in 1973. As a solo artist, Kirk released music under his own name as well as under more than 30 aliases. He also collaborated with other artists in a range of groups such as [[Sweet Exorcist (band)|Sweet Exorcist]] and [[Acid Horse]].
